content: crochet newborn baby cardigan - use this beautiful little cardigan over an all in one suit for a baby boy or over a dress for a baby girl it is made in double knitting light worsted #3 yarn and quick to crochet the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size to fit approx - 14 chest newborn baby level intermediate copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/newborn-crochet-baby-cardigan-pattern/
